title: What are the cool names for educational institutions? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all thank you for asking me to answer the question I seriously have no idea and I don't believe there's any person who can actually of a u a specific awesome names, I can certainly offer you a process and some guidelines which you must follow for a great name How to create a business name : Join two words like Skype, FlipkartUse some dictionary word like Google, Virgin,Name it based on your business like Cleartax, Big BazaarUse a completely unrelated words like Udemy, udacityMake use of expression of your message you are trying to communicate like Yahoo or open culture (educational Company), unacademyMatch care of the following criteria: Make sure the name is easy to spellMake sure you don't use any numbers because people to get confused whether to use numerical one i.e. 1 or alphabetical one i.e. OneMake sure you don't use special symbols and don't try to make it too fancy (like ©@®p00| = Carpool)Make sure that the world doesn't relate with any similar word owned by some other company or product (WhatsApp? Or What's up?)Make sure that the word is easy to remember - use this two word method for that : Coca-Cola, zig-zag, Col-gate, Goo-gle, Ya-hoo, Ama-zon, L-G, Sam-Sung, Ap-ple, i-Phone, Mac-book, Fit-bit, face-book, whats-app, etc see how they sound, is your name sounding similarly good?Can you use it as a verb? Like Google it (try ….. It) Another Example : Fuck It (lol), not every word will work here but certainly your work potential world is usefulFinal tips, can a general person understand it easily? (Google fine, Facebook fine, Altavista ? Alta what?)One of my favourite company & a great name with a great logo : Virgin Time for the acid test : Make sure that the name is available in every social media plus email id is available and the domain is available or there for sale (if you have a large vision you are going to really suffer later if they are owned by someone else) Source : My Head (Seriously, No Googling) Upvote This Answer So That New Startup Entrepreneurs Can Name Their Startup Too & Share Now If You You Someone Who Needs To Know This Feel free to ask me another question or Follow Me Here : Rajesh Singh Sekhawat (It Motivates Me To Keep Writing Answer To Help People In Need & Contribute To This Beautiful Community)

Well depends upon your institute , whether its a high school or a kindergarden or a college. whatever it is some names pop up in my mind are: village school, river valley , promise school , river view high , emerald public school , blue berry garden, school of learning and enquiry and many more. so just mention the specific type of institution.
